Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/ideation/1815970997472595968/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "SEO Optimized Article with KW Research"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/ideation/1815970997472595968/)_"
---
Based on the SERPs, do a keyword research on [PROMPT].
Using those keywords, write a 100% unique & creative article of 1600 words using  ## heading  ## and # subheadings #.  Writing style should be authoritative and conversational. Use fully detailed paragraphs that engage the reader. Break down long paragraphs for better readability. Add bullet points or numbered list (if needed). 

The article should inclide a  creative title  (can be in a form of listicle, how-to or personal experience or other engaging forms of title), meta description, # Introduction #.  Make sure thearticle is plagiarism free. Try to use [PROMPT] 2-3 times in the article, long-tail keywords of [PROMPT], and keyword variations of [PROMPT] in the article.

In the very bottom of the article, give 5 sources. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
